summary: Just a little mod with some very powerful weapons and armor for your Vampire Lord!
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to my 1st Skyrim mod. I haven\'t played with the creation kit much so this isn\'t very fancy.

Requirments:
SKSE
Dawnguard

Installation:
Just unzip this esp file into your data directory.

Description:

This mod makes available a set of very powerful armor and weapons to your player provided that they have been turned into a Vampire Lord.
The items are only craftable if you are a Vampire Lord, regular vampires do not qualify.

Armor:


Vampire King Armor, Boots, Gauntlets = I used vanilla Dawnguard models. Boosted armor ratings and custom crafting recipies.

Vampire King Crown = I used vanila Skyrim \"Bone Crown\" model. Only takes up \"Hair\" slot so a circlet is also wearable.

Vampire King Shield = I used \"Auriel\'s Shield\" model. Kept the enchantment aswell. It\'s pretty cool. Later I will modify the scripts to lessen the charge cost.


Weapons:

Vampire King Sword = It\'s just Harkon\'s Sword, only unenchanted and more powerful.

Vampire King Bow = \"Auriel\'s Bow\", unenchanted and more powerful.

Vampire King Arrows = Used \"Blood Crusted Arrows\". I tweaked the enchantment on them to behave like the Vampire absorb life spell. Much more powerful and larger AoE.


Like I said, you won\'t see them in crafting until you have become a Vampire Lord; other factions including regular vampires won\'t work.
The equipment is found in the \"Misc\" catagory.
author: Mordrid Cowl
